    • Constructor Detail

      • DatabaseAccess

        public DatabaseAccess(String database_name)
        Parameters:
        database_name - either a data source name or JDBC URL. It can also be null, in which case the default MDW data source is used
        context - EJB context. When it is not null, transaction is handled by the EJB, which must be configured with container managed transactions

      • DatabaseAccess

        public DatabaseAccess(String dbName,
                      Map<String,String> connectParams)

      • encodeMongoDoc

        public static org.bson.Document encodeMongoDoc(org.bson.Document doc)
        MongoDB doesn't allow keys to have dots (.) or to start with $. This method encodes such keys if found and returns a new BSON document

      • decodeMongoDoc

        public static org.bson.Document decodeMongoDoc(org.bson.Document doc)
        MongoDB doesn't allow keys to have dots (.) or to start with $. This method decodes such keys back to dots and $ if found and returns a new BSON document
